title: FS: T205s of Cy Young, Hal Chase, Doc White
author: square5000

posts.post_title: FS: T205s of Cy Young, Hal Chase, Doc White
posts.post_content:
Hi,
Up for sale are T205s of Cy Young, Hal Chase and Doc White. All cards are raw, but all would receive a numbered grade between Poor and, possibly, VG. The Young is very nice, popped out of a BVG case. The other two have creases and edge wear. Scans are below.

I accept Paypal, check or money order. Please email me at [url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url], or send me a PM with questions or to reserve/buy.

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
square5000 on eBay

Here are the scans:
YOUNG: $450  SOLD Sovereign back  (Purchased from Bagger's Auctions Spring 2011 [URL="http://www.baggersauctions.com/PDTL.jsp?auctionID=2&lotNumber=65&JSessionId=E00AABB2818E047DFBC12892DF8D71D3"]LINK TO AUCTION[/URL])

[IMG]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5536/11155367023_2a7a73c85d_o.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7321/11155179545_cd8209a52e_o.jpg[/IMG]



CHASE   $25  SOLD 

[IMG]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2849/11155364363_ef3bdc3ecb_o.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3745/11155185045_40e491faf2_o.jpg[/IMG]



WHITE  $25  

[IMG]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7349/11155180455_b9599fe8f0_o.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5534/11155244894_bb4c1a8282_o.jpg[/IMG]

Would it be wrong to get my wife that Cy Young for Christmas?  Reminds me of Homer Simpson getting Marge a bowling ball for her birthday...

Cheers,
Geno

Hey Geno,

Just saw your post. Yeah, your wife may not like that. I've pointed out some non-sports cards to my wife, but she says "That's nice." and changes the subject. My wife does like the T205 Doc White. She thinks he's handsome and she likes the white stocking. :rolleyes:

Peter
